plot: Jet gets a mysterious note from an old friend, Pao, and finds himself teaming up with his daughter, who uses Feng Shui to decipher it. The two are also chased by syndicate mobsters also searching for him.

Jet receives a letter from an old colleague. When he goes looking for him, he finds his gravestone. There he encounters a mysterious girl names Meifa, his colleague's daughter. Together, they search for clues across the galaxy as to her father's whereabouts.—J LeGault
